name: Alvin M. FORD et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF CRANSTON et al.
name_abbreviation: Ford v. Zoning Board of Review

parties: Alvin M. FORD et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF CRANSTON et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Carroll, Kelly & Murphy, Joseph A. Kelly, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Adler Pollock & Sheehan Incorporated, Richard W. MacAdams, Providence, for defendants-petitioners.
casebody.head_matter:
Alvin M. FORD et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF CRANSTON et al.
No. 80-284-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Aug. 28, 1980.
Carroll, Kelly & Murphy, Joseph A. Kelly, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Adler Pollock & Sheehan Incorporated, Richard W. MacAdams, Providence, for defendants-petitioners.
